entries.description: Amazon Q: word duplication when pressing tab on context selector fixed

Improve the text description of workspace index settings
Notifications: 'Dismiss' command visible in command palette.
/transform: replace icons in Transformation Hub with text

Amazon Q: increase chat current active file context char limit to 40k
/review: Code issues can be grouped by file location or severity
